title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง 4.5 - Interest rate applicable to subsequent advances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง 4.5 - Interest rate applicable to subsequent advances

State Regulations

Where an agreement with the borrower provides that the lender
shall advance funds from time to time, the maximum rate of interest applicable
to each advance shall be the maximum rate of interest authorized by law at the
time the first advance was made. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง
4.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
